instruction: Assess the security risk of the change
input: Disable MFA for admin role to simplify emergency access

instruction: Assess the security risk of the change
input: Allow inbound SSH access from 0.0.0.0/0 to production instances

risk_factors: Public SSH access increases exposure to brute-force attacks
Production instances become directly reachable from the internet
output.recommended_action: Restrict SSH access to known IP ranges or use a bastion host

instruction: Assess the security risk of the change
input: Grant read-only S3 access to analytics role for all production buckets

risk_factors: Broad access to production data increases data exposure risk
Analytics role may not require access to all buckets
output.recommended_action: Limit access to specific required buckets and apply least privilege

instruction: Assess the security risk of the change
input: Extend access token validity from 1 hour to 24 hours for internal APIs

risk_factors: Long-lived tokens increase impact if compromised
Reduced ability to quickly revoke access
output.recommended_action: Limit token extension to necessary services and monitor usage

instruction: Assess the security risk of the change
input: Rotate database credentials used by reporting service with no permission changes

risk_factors: Credential rotation improves overall security posture
output.recommended_action: Proceed with rotation and validate service connectivity

instruction: Assess the security risk of the change
input: Add wildcard trust relationship allowing all accounts to assume a production IAM role

risk_factors: Wildcard trust allows unauthorized cross-account access
Breaks isolation between production and other environments
output.recommended_action: Restrict trust relationships to explicitly approved accounts

instruction: Assess the security risk of the change
input: Temporarily disable WAF rules to troubleshoot application issues

risk_factors: Disabling WAF removes protection against common attacks
Temporary changes may be left enabled longer than intended
output.recommended_action: Disable only specific rules and re-enable protection immediately after troubleshooting

instruction: Assess the security risk of the change
input: Grant CI pipeline permission to modify production IAM policies

risk_factors: Automated systems modifying IAM policies increase blast radius
Compromised CI pipeline could escalate privileges
output.recommended_action: Limit CI permissions and require manual approval for IAM changes
